title: Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 12) Order, 2015
content:
31st July,2015 Statutory Instruments 189
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.59 OF2015
The Chiefs Act
(Laws,Volume16,Cap.287)
The Chiefs (Recognition) (No. 12) Order, 2015
WHEREASthePresidentissatisfiedthatthepersonnamedinthe
ScheduletothisOrderisentitledtoholdtheofficespecifiedinthe
Scheduleasrequiredbysubsection(2)ofsectionthreeoftheChiefs
Act:

Order,2015.

ofChief
withintheareainZambiadescribedintheSchedule,theholderof
theofficespecifiedintheSchedule.
